txt.en: The Orcs that wandered into the infected area seem to have radically changed. These were Moria and White Hand Orcs, and now they are some new form of Fungal Orc. What form of fungus could change their body and behaviour so drastically, and so quickly?

'They were once Moria and White Hand Orcs? The infection created a new form of Orc, with new behaviours and are unfriendly to their previous tribes. How curious, and frightening. They have the same mutation as the spiders?\n\n'There must be a guiding hand to this infestation. It's working too well to be simple coincidence.'

The strange fungus infecting the eastern side of Redhorn Lodes seems to have affected the spiders, and even the ground has been transformed. With the many Moria and White Hand Orcs in the area, what impact is it having on them?
The new form of Orc can be found to the east and south-east of Knakk's camp on the elevated walkway.
Knakk is camped on the elevated walkway in the north-east corner of Redhorn Lodes.
